meta.name: keyword
meta.content: wicket, web, j2ee, java, IntelliJ IDEA

section.name: IntelliJ IDEA Kick Start Guide
section.p: This kick start is a small guide to get you up and running to start using Wicket within minutes. This project is meant to be a starting point for your first project. If you are looking for examples, please look at the example projects.
This is a work in progress.
